suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider spacing out the figures more evenly to avoid overlapping and reduce the crowded feeling. This will help enhance the flow and make the scene more visually balanced. Additionally, you could experiment with varying the sizes of the elements to create a sense of depth and perspective, which can further guide the viewer's eye through the artwork.
